Profile dependencies plugin
Last Published: 2012-08-27  | Version: 1.0
Profile dependencies plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

profiledep:inject

Full name:

cchantep:maven-profiledep-plugin:1.0:inject

Description:

Profile dependency injection. Injects dependencies from profile properties. Gets profile properties matching given prefix, then parses those properties. Format used in those properties to define dependency is groupId:artifactId:version:type:scope (currently none part can be omited). Each property can define one or more dependencies, dependency strings being separated by space (' '). Injected dependencies are then treated by standard dependency mecanism (as static dependencies).

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: validate.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
prefix String - Prefix for profile properties defining dependencies
project MavenProject - Current project
Default value is: ${project}.

Parameter Details

prefix:

Prefix for profile properties defining dependencies
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: Yes

project:

Current project
  • Type: org.apache.maven.project.MavenProject
  • Required: Yes
  • Default: ${project}
